banner.title: Auction rules

banner.item2: Expiration period: To prevent from long running and forgotten sales, your auction and its bids will be canceled {{validity}} after the selected end date. You can always recreate a sale at the end of the period.

welcomeModal.title: Welcome to the DEFY Black Market.
welcomeModal.description:
This is a peer to peer trading platform allowing DEFY operatives to buy and sell materials, equipment and tools that enhance your game play in DEFY.

Most in game items are user collected via the map or generated via the nanoforge. Get out, explore and find those materials. There's something super rare somewhere around you right nowâ€¦

Here, youâ€™ll find everything you need to take your gameplay to the next level and a market to sell your excess items to other operatives. The revolution depends us working together.

Good Hunting Operatives!
